channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report X-2024021483
item.description:
Report X-2024021483

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-29T18:14:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-19
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found leaking on load side. Placed in a tote. DescribePack: Appears to be leaking due to seal failure on inner containers DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in a tote.

item.title: Report X-2024020875
item.description:
Report X-2024020875

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-01
  • City: MCALESTER
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was loaded in back of trailer package fell out when trailer door was opened hazmat package was not braced when loaded as required package was placed in hazmat tote and processed DescribePack: screw lids for bottles came off DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in tote to contain spill

item.title: Report X-2024021099
item.description:
Report X-2024021099

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-23T18:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-17
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found on back of belt 1 with open closers and visible wet damage. internal contents have loose caps and internal leakage due to insufficient packaging. DescribePack: Loose Caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Items were quickly placed in a hazardous waste bag and placed into a Red Tote.
